Text: Ripped from old VCR tapes, quality not too great but watchable. All commercials removed. I'll try to seed for a month or so. Please seed if you can. O.J. is in the news again in case you didn't notice. :)

For the person using BitComet at cpe.net.cable.rogers.com I noticed your constant disconnect and reconnect. Nothing I was doing on my end but you seemed to have a problem dl with BitComet. It would start out ok but within a few seconds the dl would die down to nothing.

Might I suggest switching to UTorrent or Bittorrent, seems to have greater success.

I'll try to seed at least a month, 24 hours a day. Until someone else wants to seed.
